params.isLong: boolean denoting if the synthetic token is long or short
params.marketIndex: market index this synthetic token belongs to
params.syntheticSymbol: ticker symbol of the synthetic token

returns.syntheticToken: - address of the created synthetic token

constructor.notice: sets the address of the longShort contract on initialization

createSyntheticToken(string,string,addre.notice: creates and sets up a new synthetic token

userdoc.notice: contract is used to reliably mint the synthetic tokens used by the float protocol.
